# load libraries
```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(rio)
library(ggplot2)
library(Hmisc)
library(lubridate)
```

# import data
```{r}
test_df <- import(here("data", "sc-test-data.csv"))
mturk_df <- import(here("data", "sc-mturk-file.csv"))
```

# clean data
```{r}
mturk_df <- mturk_df %>% 
  rename(., ID = AmazonIdentifier) %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()
```
